description: Search for the song 'Beijing Welcomes You' in QQ Music and verify the search results display.

test_scenario.objective: Search for the song 'Beijing Welcomes You' in QQ Music
steps: Click search entry (search in homepage or bottom navigation)
Enter in search box: Beijing Welcomes You
Submit search (click search button or keyboard enter)
Wait for loading and view search results list
Verify that the song 'Beijing Welcomes You' appears in results
test_scenario.expected_result: Search results contain the song 'Beijing Welcomes You' and can be clicked to enter details
success_criteria: At least one result title contains 'Beijing Welcomes You'
No error popups or loading failure prompts
